channel.title: Well this happened
channel.description: I ordered Pizza from Pizzahut because I am a fatty and it was over 20minutes late, and here is what the driver told me happened, and sadly I believe him because he gave me a discount and everything. [hr] It would seem the driver had a hunting sticker on his car, and the people he went to before me refused to pay him because of his sticker saying "I am not going to give my hard earned money to a person who kills helpless animals". So the driver had to call the manager and he had to drive over there to sort things out, so he could come and bring me my pizza. The best part of that the order before me that he dropped off to the people, was a meat lovers pizza and wingstreet wings.... Like seriously?

item.title: Well this happened
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:8, topic:518813”][quote author=Krackkid link=topic=637081.msg4295400#msg4295400 date=1368127922]

So you’re complaining or just telling what happened? Discounted pizza hut is fine by me.
[/quote]Trying to figure why someone would say they don’t like hunting, then order a meat lovers and wings o.o

People should buy their meat in the store so no animals gets hurt.

[/quote]

Heh. You shoot a deer and you’ll be eating it daily for 6 months. Much cheaper than the store. I can’t blame anyone for doing it. Moose is even better.

OT: joys of retail, lots of idiots out there.

Read full topic

item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Oh thanks Bowser! I will try that for now on, that must be why they bought it from Pizzahut how silly of me.
